summary: MBT - Enable multiple in-game skin mods on any character at any given time in game - currently 16 included with this mod!
descriptionHtml:
checkout the ReadMe.txt for extended details.

This mod is a Master \"Plugin\" mod (esm vs the traditional esp file).

I assembled it for proof of concept and to let armor modders out there have a new tool to utilize single armors with multiple body-textures (I\'m certain many have seen the terrible affects of using a UNP armor while using a CBBE texture).

Included in this mod are 15 custom body mods (and even the Vanilla mod, making a total of 16 additional skin textures to use).

Body Textures:
(from the \"readme.txt\")


Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC by AcDale:
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390]ADEC (1.2)[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
 CBBE2
 CBBE2sl [slim edition]
 CBBE3
 CBBE3bs [BodySlider edition]
 CBBE3sl [Slim edition]

CBBE Based:
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12994]CBBE3eros [numenume erosbody for CBBE by numenume][/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13180]CBBEv3M [CBBEv3M Body Repalacer by MAK][/url]

CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling:
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]CHSBHC[/url]
 
CHSBHC T-V body with BBP for Navetsea Texture and TriRoc Adu by Redram80:
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11072]CHSBHCrr[/url]

Rebirth Female Body Shape by arison_c:
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12179]RFBS[/url]

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99:
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]UNP (1.2)[/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10470]UNPbb [Bouncing Boobs edition][/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]UNPsk [Skinny edition][/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13407]UNPbs [BodySlider edition][/url]

Vanilla:
 copied straight from the BSA files





From the \"readme2\":

This mod is 700MB+ and therefore it is broken up into parts:
Part 1:
*  MBT_Base-female.esm - this file is the master \'plugin\' file and contains the base references to all textures
*  Meshes <folder> - (obviously where the meshes [aka nif\'s] go!) - each body type has its own unique folder name
*  textures - shell folders <folder> - this is where the textures go! - it is a \"shell\" folder meaning it contains the folder heirarchy but no textures, they are to be downloaded separately if you want to use mine from the screenshots.
Part 2:
*  Textures <folder> - (obviously where the textures go!) - it reflects the same folder structure that the meshes contain, each mod containing its own unique folder name
Part 3 [requires MBT_Base-female.esm and a filled Textures folder]:
*  MBT_Skins.esp - this plugin (need I say it references the ESM?) has craftable skins (in MISC) for all body skins, fully weight-adjustable as allowed by the moders and with skin color support.


Stay tuned for updates to any literature relating to this mod for details of creating your own. I\'ve been wanting to post this for over a week, and the comments, details and credits are draining my life.
author: veekahn
